title: John Wick: Titans Of Cult Steelbook Collector's Edition Discounted At Amazon
description: John Wick: Titans of Cult Steelbook (4K Blu-ray) $53.49 (was $60) See at Amazon The beloved action franchise John Wick celebrated its 10th anniversary last fall with a new collector's edition of the film that started it all. The Amazon-exclusive John Wick: Titans of Cult Steelbook is on sale for the first time. Normally $60, this stylish 4K Blu-ray edition is discounted to $53.49 for a limited time. John Wick was already available on 4K Blu-ray prior to this release, but the Titans of Cult edition marks the first time the film has supported Dolby Vision. This limited-edition release includes 4K, standard Blu-ray, and digital versions of the movie.John Wick: Titans of Cult 4K Steelbook (Amazon Exclusive)$53.49 ($60)John Wick: Titans of Cult 4K SteelbookLike other Titans of Cult limited-edition releases, the presentation and packaging here is impressive. When you unhook the clasp the open the oversized box you're greeted with a recreation of John Wick's hidden gun case on the left. The box contains the steelbook case featuring John Wick on one side and his dog Daisy on the other. The steelbook holds the 4K and standard Blu-ray discs, each of which have art depicting tires from John Wick's prized 1969 Ford Mustang Boss 429. The box set also comes with four art cards, an acrylic stand to display them, and a replica enamel Continental coin pin.Here's a list of the special features included across the two discs:Continue Reading at GameSpot
excerpt: The Titans of Cult edition of John Wick comes with several cool collectibles and presents the film with Dolby Vision for the first time.

html:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

The beloved action franchise John Wick celebrated its 10th anniversary last fall with a new collector's edition of the film that started it all. The Amazon-exclusive John Wick: Titans of Cult Steelbook is on sale for the first time. Normally $60, this stylish 4K Blu-ray edition is discounted to $53.49 for a limited time. John Wick was already available on 4K Blu-ray prior to this release, but the Titans of Cult edition marks the first time the film has supported Dolby Vision. This limited-edition release includes 4K, standard Blu-ray, and digital versions of the movie.

John Wick: Titans of Cult 4K Steelbook (Amazon Exclusive)

$53.49 ($60)

Like other Titans of Cult limited-edition releases, the presentation and packaging here is impressive. When you unhook the clasp the open the oversized box you're greeted with a recreation of John Wick's hidden gun case on the left. The box contains the steelbook case featuring John Wick on one side and his dog Daisy on the other. The steelbook holds the 4K and standard Blu-ray discs, each of which have art depicting tires from John Wick's prized 1969 Ford Mustang Boss 429. The box set also comes with four art cards, an acrylic stand to display them, and a replica enamel Continental coin pin.

Here's a list of the special features included across the two discs:

  • Audio commentary from Chad Stahelski and David Leitch (4K)
  • Don’t **** With John Wick (4K)
  • Calling in the Cavalry (4K)
  • Destiny of a Collective
  • Assassin’s Code
  • Red Circle
  • NYC Noir
  • John Wick Anniversary Panel at IGN Live
  • Theatrical trailer

If you're looking for more John Wick Blu-rays, the previously released John Wick 4K UHD is currently on sale for $15 (was $23), so if you don’t need the fancy steelbook or any of the collectibles, you can pay far less. That said, you will lose out on Dolby Vision--and you're probably better off opting for one of the collections below.

Those interested in checking out the entire series in 4K will want to pick up the John Wick: Chapters 1-3 Box Set. It includes the first three films in 4K and digital, and is now on sale for $29 (was $45). If you want a collectible box set, Walmart's exclusive John Wick: Chapters 1-3 Stash Collection Steelbook is available for $50. You can round out the series by snagging John Wick: Chapter 4 on 4K Blu-ray for $15.49 (was $23).

It’s not offered in 4K, but the standard John Wick: Chapter 1-4 Collection contains standard Blu-ray and digital versions of all four films and is just $30. That makes it one of the cheapest ways to add all four John Wick movies to your collection.
